content.raw:
Pinning the pelvis instead of sitting is fine - just make sure to actually pin the pelvis and not the utorso like it is right now. ;) 

You probably also need to make the table static in order to get a stable cordless drill. With a dynamic table the drill penetrates the table which in turn penetrates the floor which causes none of the objects to come to rest and the drill starts drifting.
content.html:
Pinning the pelvis instead of sitting is fine - just make sure to actually pin the pelvis and not the utorso like it is right now. ;)

You probably also need to make the table static in order to get a stable cordless drill. With a dynamic table the drill penetrates the table which in turn penetrates the floor which causes none of the objects to come to rest and the drill starts drifting.
